model Module¶

model Module¶

class model.Model[source]¶

Bases: object

__init__()[source]¶

No member attributes need to be created

get_route(start, destination, is_xml)[source]¶

Creates a query to the google drive API, either parses the XML or JSON File :param start: the string which holds the information where the route is to be started :param destination: the string which holds the information where the route ends :param is_xml: boolean which determines whether a XML or JSON file is to be requested :return: A html-formatted string where the route is described and a status for the GUI
